chinese: 以给予，许可 n，许可
english: grant

chinese: 地铁委员会允许盲人携带导盲犬上地铁。
english: The Subway Committee grants the blind permission to bring guide dogs on board

chinese: 2）顽固的；倔强的；难对付的
english: stubborn

chinese: 这个顽固的男人捂着耳朵拒绝听人讲话。
english: The stubborn man covered his ears and refused to listen

chinese: n. 股票
english: stock

chinese: 大屏幕上显示着很多种股票。
english: Many types of stocks are displayed on the large screen

chinese: n. 托儿所
english: nursery

chinese: 上班之前，我把孩子们送去了托儿所。
english: I drop off my kids at the nursery before I go to work

chinese: adl.必不可少的，极其重要的；本质的；重要的；基本的 n.要素；必需品
english: essential

chinese: 水、食物和空气对于生命而言是必不可少的。
english: Water, food and air are essential to life

chinese: ad），平静的，安宁的；和平的
english: peaceful

chinese: 她平静地坐在湖边。
english: She sits by the lake in a peaceful way

chinese: n.晦涩
english: obscurity

chinese: 这本用古英语写的书晦涩难懂，使他感到烦
english: He's troubled by the obscurity of the book, which is written in Old English

chinese: 几. 精神，心灵
english: spirit

chinese: 鸽子衔着橄榄枝的标志象征着和平友爱的精神。
english: The dove with an olive branch symbol captures the spirit of peace and friendship

chinese: n，期望；预期，期待
english: expectation

chinese: 我父母的期望听上去是一个不可能完成的任务。
english: My parents' expectation sounds like a mission impossible

chinese: 几.柄，把手处理，解决
english: handle

chinese: 转动把手来开门。
english: Turn the handle to open the door

chinese: 压迫的
english: oppressive

chinese: 伽利略所面对的是一个压迫性的社会，当时的人们认为他的理论是荒谬的。
english: Galileo faced an oppressive society which, at the time, considered his theories ridiculous

chinese: D.安静，平静
english: tranquility

chinese: 比起城市生活，我更喜欢乡村的宁静。
english: I prefer the tranquility of countryside to city life

chinese: adi.光学的
english: optic

chinese: 光学望远镜通过收集和聚焦光线来形成放大的图像。
english: The optical telescope gathers and focuses light to create a magnified image

chinese: n.解决；结算；协议；定居点
english: settlement

chinese: 让我们合作吧，我想我们能得出某种解决方法。
english: Let's work together; I think we can come to some kind of settlement

chinese: n.主张；辩护
english: advocacy

chinese: 他的环保主张得到了全球范围内许多人的响
english: His advocacy of environmental protection is echoed by many people across the globe

chinese: 几.分类，归类；（动植物等的）分类学
english: classification

chinese: 请把垃圾分成不同的类别。
english: Please sort your garbage into different classifications
